snippet.title: The Last Cube - 9 Minutes of Gameplay (Ice Level)
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/903630/The_Last_Cube/
The Last Cube is also coming to consoles. Read more below:

This gameplay video shows a level of The Last Cube that accessed at a later stage of the game. In this level a new mechanic is introduced to the player - ice. The player also uses mechanics that were learned before this level, such as magnets and using sticker powers. When a sticker is on the cube's top face, the player can use its power (for example with the green sticker the player can create a temporary green cube; purple sticker lets the player teleport to a nearby square).

Venture through six unique areas of the cube-world and overcome three-dimensional brain-teasers in this upcoming puzzle adventure game. You, the Last Cube, were awakened for a purpose—save this peculiar world from collapsing by solving puzzle tracks left by your ancestors.

Follow the game at:
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/thelastcube/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/improxgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/improxgames/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/improxgames/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/improxgames
Developed by Improx Games: https://improxgames.com/
